document.full_text: the chief executive of caterpillar inc  has warned the governor of illinois that state spending and an unfavorable business climate could undermine the competitiveness of illinois-based companies.
document.title: caterpillar ceo warns of discomfort with illinois
lines_and_colors: the chief executive of caterpillar inc  has warned the governor of illinois that state spending and an unfavorable business climate could undermine the competitiveness of illinois-based companies.
